name: Fo(x)tPrint
description:
You play a fox trying to find its way home.  You have to sneak by each area, avoiding being seen & attacked by the dogs.

But there is a twist!  You consistently leave behind your footprints that the dogs can pick up and follow.

So, be careful where you step! 

Controls:

WASD - movement.

Made by:

Level & Game Designer - Lewis McKeegan - https://less-than-three.itch.io/

Art - Zoe von Runkel - https://itch.io/profile/zvr8888

Player & Camera Movement- Dennkui - https://itch.io/profile/dennkui

IA/Footprint system - Pyerre - https://pyerre.itch.io/
